answers.answer: I have no idea what "ferritin" level is, and there is no way to tell if all the things are related without seeing a doctor. When you say you have a high blood sugar, have you been diagnosed as diabetic? If so, what are you doing to reduce your blood sugar? If not, do see a doctor and see if you have diabetes and get a treatment plan.

question: I have an extremely high ferritin level, high sugar count, heart beating too fast and high cholosterol, my toe nails on the big toe next to it on left leg and a pain in my left leg can all these be all related?
title: What is going on with my body?
